ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And also the birds, flocking together, all of them turned to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the levied Tair. They were all obedient to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the birds, too, in their flocks, and turn again and again to celebrating Allah's glory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We made the birds assemble around him in flocks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And birds gathered together; they were all obedient to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (so did) the birds assembled, all obedient to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the birds gathered together; all joined in singing with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the birds, duly mustered, every one to him reverting;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the birds assembled; all were turning unto Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the birds, too, in flocks, all turned to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the birds also, gathering all oft-returning onto Him on his account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and the birds [as well], mustered [in flocks]; all echoing him [in a chorus].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the birds gathered (in assemblies): all with him did turn (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (so did) the birds assembled: all with him [Dawud (David)] did turn (to Allah i.e. glorified His Praises).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and the birds, too, gathered each obedient to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the birds, gathered together. All obedient to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating [praises].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:19] And, We disposed, the birds, mustered [in flocks], gathered before him, glorifying with him; each, of the mountains and birds, turning to him, reverting to obedience of him by glorifying [God with him].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the birds assembled; all were turning unto Him) obedient to Him.
